definition: the rind of a fruit or vegetable, get undressed
details:
noun
- the rind of a fruit or vegetable
= synonyms: skin
verb
- get undressed
= synonyms: strip
- come off in flakes or thin small pieces
= example: come off in flakes or thin small pieces
= synonyms: flake, peel off, flake off
- strip the skin off
= synonyms: skin
